text: Claudio Águila (born 29 January 1961) is an Argentine rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Argentina Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Argentina Category:Rowers at the 1987 Pan American Games
title: Claudio Águila
